title: How to Make Organic Lotion

methods.name: Making the Base of Your Lotion

steps.headline: Pour the oil into a Pyrex measuring cup and then add the beeswax.
Set the Pyrex container in a saucepan.
Fill the pan with water until it reaches about halfway up the sides of the Pyrex container.
Heat on the stove.
steps.description: When the beeswax melts into the oil, remove the pan from the stove.

steps.headline: Allow the mixture to cool for a minute, but be careful of the hardening beeswax.
Pour the cup of water into a blender and blend it on high speed.
By using a small opening in the top of the blender lid, pour your oil/beeswax mixture into the moving water.
steps.description: It will start to thicken as you pour the oil.

steps.headline: Store the lotion.
steps.description: Pour the lotion in the blender into glass jars for storing. Make sure to get every last drop in the bottom of the blender!

steps.headline: Enjoy!
steps.description: This is a cheaper way to make quality oil right from home.
